https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7LAPWHDij9fdQ2MCNAnQWrBnKpE.jpg A film rooted in its rural milieu, told with empathy and pathos, a story of survival revolving around the well of mortgage & a situational Second marriage, where crucial yet tough decisions need to be taken. Chhaya
